statements: SELECT * FROM rental_income_expenses;
SELECT rental_income, expenses FROM rental_income_expenses WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT property_id, rental_income, expenses, report_date FROM rental_income_expenses WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM rental_income_expenses ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, SUM(rental_income) AS total_rental_income FROM rental_income_expenses GROUP BY property_id;
SELECT * FROM rental_income_expenses WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT property_id, rental_income, expenses FROM rental_income_expenses WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT property_id, rental_income - expenses AS net_income FROM rental_income_expenses WHERE expenses > 1000;
SELECT * FROM rental_income_expenses WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY rental_income DESC;
SELECT AVG(rental_income) AS average_income, MAX(expenses) AS max_expenses FROM rental_income_expenses;
SELECT * FROM rental_income_expenses;
SELECT * FROM rental_income_expenses WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT rental_type, rent_amount FROM rental_income_expenses WHERE rent_amount > 1000;
SELECT property_id, rental_type, rent_amount FROM rental_income_expenses ORDER BY rent_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT property_id FROM rental_income_expenses;
SELECT * FROM rental_income_expenses WHERE category = 'Income' AND year = 2021 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT year, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM rental_income_expenses GROUP BY year HAVING total_amount > 10000
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS count FROM rental_income_expenses WHERE year = 2022 GROUP BY category
SELECT * FROM rental_income_expenses WHERE year = 2020 AND amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
SELECT DISTINCT year FROM rental_income_expenses ORDER BY year
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT id, property_name, address FROM properties ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT tenant_name, lease_start_date, lease_end_date FROM tenants WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT property_name, rental_income - expense AS net_income FROM properties;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE rental_income > 5000;
SELECT property_name, address, rental_income FROM properties WHERE rental_income BETWEEN 3000 AND 6000 ORDER BY rental_income DESC;

SELECT tenants.tenant_name, properties.property_name, transactions.amount FROM tenants JOIN properties ON tenants.property_id = properties.id JOIN transactions ON tenants.property_id = transactions.property_id;
SELECT DISTINCT property_name, address FROM properties LEFT JOIN tenants ON properties.id = tenants.property_id WHERE tenants.id IS NULL;
SELECT property_name, SUM(rental_income) AS total_rental_income FROM properties GROUP BY property_name HAVING total_rental_income > 10000 ORDER BY total_rental_income DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT property_name, address FROM rental_properties;
SELECT tenant_id, tenant_name, start_date FROM tenants ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT property_name, monthly_rent, expenses FROM rental_properties WHERE monthly_rent > expenses;
SELECT property_id, property_name, address FROM rental_properties WHERE property_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties WHERE monthly_rent > 2000 ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT tenant_name, payment_date, amount FROM tenants JOIN rental_payments ON tenants.tenant_id = rental_payments.tenant_id WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT property_name, SUM(monthly_rent + expenses) AS total_cost FROM rental_properties JOIN expenses ON rental_properties.property_id = expenses.property_id GROUP BY property_name;

SELECT tenant_name, property_name, payment_date, amount FROM tenants JOIN rental_payments ON tenants.tenant_id = rental_payments.tenant_id JOIN rental_properties ON tenants.property_id = rental_properties.property_id WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;

SELECT tenant_name, start_date, end_date, property_name FROM tenants JOIN rental_properties ON tenants.property_id = rental_properties.property_id ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date ASC, tenant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Properties;
SELECT property_name, rental_income FROM Properties WHERE rental_income > 1000;
SELECT tenant_name, lease_start, lease_end FROM Tenants ORDER BY lease_end DESC;
SELECT property_name, address FROM Properties WHERE rental_income < expenses;
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM Payments WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Properties WHERE rental_income > 1000 ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT property_name, address, rental_income FROM Properties WHERE rental_income BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY address, rental_income DESC;
SELECT tenant_name, lease_start, lease_end FROM Tenants INNER JOIN Properties ON Tenants.property_id = Properties.property_id WHERE rental_income > 1500 ORDER BY tenant_name;
SELECT tenant_name, payment_date, amount FROM Tenants INNER JOIN Payments ON Tenants.tenant_id = Payments.tenant_id WHERE amount >= 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT expense_type, amount, expense_date FROM Expenses WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY expense_date ASC, expense_type;
